summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1767, for the improvement of Aurora Avenue from North Sixty-sixth Street to North Eighty-fifth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and wooden crosswalks, together with the necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 18666 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
